scripts/build.sh.docstring:
A script that invokes Aurix GCC compiler provided with AURIX Development Studio
Make sure to have the compiler, cmake and make in your paths

scripts/flash.sh.docstring: A script to flash to produced binary in the kit_a2g_tc334_lite dev board

toolchain/tricore-gcc.cmake.docstring: A toolchain file to enable the Aurix GCC toolchain with cmake

bsp/CMakeLists.txt.docstring:
A manually written CMake file on top of the auto-generated code (iLLD and hardware config) by AURIX Development Studio after creating a blank project for kit_a2g_tc334_lite.
 Does not ,ake eveything available, only the necessary drivers.

src/task_controller.hpp.docstring: A lightweight task scheduler that abstract the timers

src/task_controller.cpp.docstring: A lightweight task scheduler that abstract the timers

src/board.hpp.docstring: The abstraction layer to configure the dev board (kit_a2g_tc334_lite)

src/scrutiny_integration.hpp.docstring: The app wrapper that integrates scrutiny in this demo by connecting the AscLin module (UART) to the scrutiny streams.

src/scrutiny_integration.cpp.docstring: The app wrapper that integrates scrutiny in this demo by connecting the AscLin module (UART) to the scrutiny streams.

src/board.cpp.docstring: The abstraction layer to configure the dev board (kit_a2g_tc334_lite)

src/wave_function_generator.cpp.docstring: A class that generate a periodic wave with common shapes

src/wave_function_generator.hpp.docstring: A class that generate a periodic wave with common shapes

src/ignored_file.cpp.docstring: A file that demonstrate the ability to filter out compile units from the postbuild toolchain
